alert.note: Alert for Garden; Grant (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 27 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cherry, western Grant, northern Garden and southern Sheridan Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 309 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles southeast of Antioch, or 22 miles southeast of Alliance, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ellsworth, Antioch, Watson Lake, Patterson Lake, Finnegan Lake, Swede Lake, Britton Lake, Kincaid Lake, Kennedy Lake, Wild Horse Flats, Snow Lake, Miles Lake, Mumper, Bingham, Wickson Lake, Diamond Lake, Lakeside, Wolf Hill, Herman Lake and Dominick Lake. This includes the following highways... Highway 250 between mile markers 1 and 21. Highway 2 between mile markers 96 and 136. Highway 61 near mile marker 145. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
